page.title: 12HEMBURY WOODS
page.content: On the 23rd of May we visited{Hembury {Wood.}At this present time 1985 Hembury Woods workmen are trying to preserve the natural beauty of the forest. {1.}To maintain the health of the woods and estate for posterity. {2.}To improve facilities for the general public to visit and use the woods. {3.}To reinstate a neolithic camp (Hembury Castle) {4.}To preserve the river bank and the boundaries of the woods. Since{1939}the woods have been untouched by woodsmen.This is a charming and unspoilt area visited by local people.The forest work planed will be aiming to maintain the {OAK {FOREST.
